articles.title: What Is Convalescent Plasma, and Why Do We Care About It? - The New York Times
articles.description: Plasma from people who have recovered from Covid-19 may help others fight the disease.
articles.content:
A medical procedure doctors have used to treat novel diseases for a century has emerged as a focal point in the fight against Covid-19: convalescent plasma.
Conva-what-now?
Convalescent plasma is the term used for plasma that is removed from the blood of a … [+8375 chars]
